## IASTNodeLocationSvg.setMarkerSvg() method

Add the marker SVG to this node's SVG group.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setMarkerSvg(markerSvg: SVGElement | null): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  markerSvg | SVGElement \| null | The SVG root of the marker to be added to the SVG group. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
